comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: Siding track on the left, and other sidings, removed with space now occupied by a multi-level car park. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Springwood_railway_station,_New_Sou... for a present day photo from the air.

comment.author: 26602074@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Springwood NSW, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: wow creepy  so you put in the lattitude and longitude the wrong way round and google earth still comes up at exactly the right place.    I guess a lattitude of 150 is impossible so it realises they are the wrong way around.
